title: 426: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 3 (What in the Meatball is Going On??)
itunes:title: 426: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 3 (What in the Meatball is Going On??)
description:
Bekah is back and it is time for The Broads to GO OFF about this Bachelorette episode - because they have a lot of strong opinions and a whole lot of questions!
